title: New Fiora Ult
body: Hmm... The new Fiora ult has the potential to be utterly devastating. However, I would daresay the new ult is THE most difficult ult to perform in the game. Now, I'm not a Fiora main or anything, but I think it might need to be toned down a little bit. Maybe reset Q when she pops a vital. This would still leave it as a fairly high skill minigame, but it would decrease the difficulty from being ridiculous to hard.

replies.body: I think Q reset would be a bit much. Perhaps some kind of movement speed boost? Or give her the ability to move through units while it's active.
No don't Reset her Q on a vital, that gives her too much mobility and makes it probably the most bullshit ult.
